page.title: 12LOCAL ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There are several churches in our area, including St. Matthews C of E., Ebenezers Methodists and Heywood United Reform Congregational, all of which are in {Northowram.}Associated with these churches are several youth groups, such as Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts as well as a Youth Club at St. Matthews. There are two cricket clubs, one football club and a bowling club in{Northowram,}and a football club at{Stump Cross.}There are three play groups in our area at St. Matthews and Ebenezer churches and one at Salterlee School, Shibden. The Shibden Valley Society and the Shibden Valley W.I. also meet at Salterlee School. The Shibden Valley Society was formed to protect the valley from development and also to protect footpaths etc.
